      rw [ha]

    simp

theorem putnam_2020_a3
  (a : ℕ → ℝ)
  (ha0 : a 0 = Real.pi / 2)
  (ha : ∀ n, a (n+1) = Real.sin (a n)) :
  (∃ L, Tendsto (fun m : ℕ => ∑ n ∈ Finset.Icc 1 m, (a n)^2) atTop (𝓝 L)) ↔ putnam_2020_a3_solution := by
  have h₁ : ∀ n, 0 < a n := by
    intro n
    induction n with
    | zero =>
      -- Base case: n = 0
      norm_num [ha0, Real.pi_pos]
      <;> linarith [Real.pi_gt_three]
    | succ n ih =>
      -- Inductive step: assume the statement holds for n, prove for n+1
      rw [ha]
      exact Real.sin_pos_of_pos_of_lt_pi ih (by
        have : a n < Real.pi := by
          have : a n < Real.pi / 2 + Real.pi / 2 := by linarith [Real.pi_pos]
          linarith [Real.pi_pos]
        linarith [Real.pi_pos])
  have h₂ : ∀ n, a n ≥ 0 := by
    intro n
    induction n with
    | zero =>
      -- Base case: n = 0
      norm_num [ha0]
    | succ n ih =>
      -- Inductive step: assume the statement holds for n, prove for n+1
      rw [ha]
      exact Real.sin_nonneg_of_mem_Icc ⟨by linarith [ih, h₁ n], by linarith [ih, h₁ n]⟩
  have h₃ : ∀ n, a n ≤ 1 := by
    intro n
    induction n with
    | zero =>
      -- Base case: n = 0
      norm_num [ha0]
      <;> linarith [Real.pi_gt_three]
    | succ n ih =>
      -- Inductive step: assume the statement holds for n, prove for n+1
      rw [ha]
      exact Real.sin_le_one (a n)
  have h₄ : ∀ n, (a n)^2 ≤ 1 := by
    intro n
    have h₅ : 0 ≤ a n := h₂ n
    have h₆ : a n ≤ 1 := h₃ n
    nlinarith [Real.sin_sq_add_cos_sq (a n)]
  have h₅ : ∑' n : ℕ, (a n)^2 ≤ ∑' n : ℕ, 1 := by
    apply tsum_le_tsum
    · intro n
      exact h₄ n
    · exact summable_one
    · exact summable_one
  have h₆ : ∑' n : ℕ, (a n)^2 = ∑' n : ℕ, 1 := by
    apply tsum_congr
    intro n
    have h₇ : (a n)^2 = 1 := by
      have h₈ : a n ≥ 0 := h₂ n
      have h₉ : a n ≤ 1 := h₃ n
      have h₁₀ : a n = 1 := by
        have h₁₁ : a n = 1 := by
          have h₁₂ : a n = Real.sin (a (n - 1)) := by
            cases n with
